action_desc: Scroll up to open the search bar
action_result: I clicked on the search bar, which is located at the top middle of the screen. This allows us to enter the app's name, "VLC for Android," into the search field. This action is important because it helps us find the app in the app store, which is necessary for installing VLC for Android.
